name: Let's Go Eat
description:
The convention center exhibit hall is closed. Everyone is excited to go to dinner but tired and hungry from a long day of working the convention floor. You are a staggering group of sore-footed friends who just want to eat with as little frustration as possible. Everyone wants something. No one will say what.

Welcome to Let's Go Eat, the first tactical passive aggression simulator.

Let's Go Eat was originally published on The Yearbook Office.
